mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(EXHIBITION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS EXHIBITION_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(RECEPTION_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RECEPTION_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(END_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS END_DATE, IF(RECEPTION_DATE<=NOW() AND NOW()<=END_DATE, "접수중", IF(NOW()<RECEPTION_DATE, "접수전", "접수종료")) AS STAT FROM NOTICE_INFO ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC

SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(EXHIBITION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS EXHIBITION_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(RECEPTION_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RECEPTION_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(END_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS END_DATE FROM NOTICE_INFO WHERE RECEPTION_DATE <= NOW() AND NOW() <= END_DATE ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC

SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(EXHIBITION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS EXHIBITION_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(RECEPTION_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RECEPTION_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(END_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS END_DATE FROM NOTICE_INFO WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{notice_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE_INFO ( NOTICE_TITLE, RECEPTION_DATE, END_DATE, EXHIBITION_DATE, REG_USER_NO, REG_DT )VALUES( #{notice_title}, #{reception_date}, #{end_date}, #{exhibition_date}, #{reg_user_no}, NOW() )
